subject: [Phase 2] Migrate user skills and merge humanize-draft
description:
1. Move strategic-communication from claude/skills/ to writing-toolkit plugin
2. Merge humanize-draft into review-draft:
   - Read both SKILL.md files to understand current content
   - Fold phrase detection logic from humanize-draft into review-draft's clarity critic
   - Leave humanize-draft as a stub that delegates to review-draft with deprecation notice
3. Sync code-toolkit agents: copy codex.md and claude.md from cache back to source
4. Clean up claude/skills/ â€” remove migrated skills (agent-teams, externalise-handover, custom-compact, strategic-communication, my-insights), keep 13 core skills
